title: Video Editor - Filipino/English
job_overview:
We’re looking for a skilled video editor who knows how to create effective Instagram Reels.
If you have a good understanding of current trends, pacing, and attention-grabbing hooks, and you're confident turning raw footage into short-form content that connects with viewers, we’d be happy to work with you.

What you’ll be working on:
- Editing vertical videos, mainly for Instagram Reels
- Adding captions, music, transitions, and sound effects
- Following the brand’s tone and style guidelines
- Collaborating with our content team to meet daily output goals

What we’re looking for:
- Experience editing Reels, TikToks, or YouTube Shorts
- Comfortable using tools like Premiere Pro, Final Cut, CapCut, or similar
- Strong sense of storytelling and pacing
- Portfolio or past work samples to show your style and approach

Role details:
- Fully remote position
- Full-time work only
- Must be available to work more than 40 hours per week
